title: HOW TO make a Gravity Fed Water Supply | What You Need.

tasks.task: Setting up a gravity-fed system using a jerry can for camp water access
subtasks: Collecting necessary materials (20mm BPA thread, 13mm barb, Teflon tape, garden hose, inline tap, hose clamp)
Dealing with the water outlet on the jerry can (removing plug, threading BPA and barb, securing with Teflon tape)
Connecting the garden hose to the 20mm thread using the hose fitting and inline tap
Ensuring proper hose length and connection, using a hose clamp to secure connections
Testing the system for leaks and functionality
Storing and retrieving the setup for use at camp, demonstrating flexibility between different jerry can sizes
Addressing pet disturbance (monitoring a dog's activities) during setup
